scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run serve"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build-server"
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd backend && npm i" "cd frontend && npm i"
scripts.audit-fix: concurrently " npm audit fix" "cd backend && npm audit fix" "cd frontend && npm audit fix"
